info.title: Giftcard Provider Protocol
info.description:
>ℹ️ Onboarding guide > > Check the new [Payments onboarding guide](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/payments-overview). We created this guide to improve the onboarding experience for developers at VTEX. It assembles all documentation on our Developer Portal about Payments and is organized by focusing on the developer's journey. The **Gift Card Provider Protocol** is a set of definitions to help you integrate your Gift Card API into VTEX platform. To achieve this, you need to implement a web API (REST) following the specifications from this documentation and configure your provider in your store using [Gift Card Hub API](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/giftcard-hub-api#overview). ## Common parameters in the documentation
{{providerApiEndpoint}} Provider's endpoint for the implementation (mandatory)
{{X-PROVIDER-API-AppKey}} The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional)
{{X-PROVIDER-API-AppToken}} The AppToken configured by the merchant (optional)

post.description: Returns a list of all gift cards available from a gift card provider for a specific cart or customer.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Media type(s) that is/are acceptable for the response. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The Media type of the body of the request. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json

parameters.name: REST-Range
parameters.description: Pagination control. This query variable must follow the format _resources={from}-{to}_.

parameters.name: X-PROVIDER-API-AppKey
parameters.description: The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional configuration)

parameters.name: X-PROVIDER-API-AppToken
parameters.description: The AppToken configured by the merchant (optional configuration)

get.description: Returns information for a specific gift card from a gift card provider.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Media type(s) that is/are acceptable for the response. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The Media type of the body of the request. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json

parameters.name: X-PROVIDER-API-AppKey
parameters.description: The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional configuration)

parameters.name: X-PROVIDER-API-AppToken
parameters.description: The AppToken configured by the merchant (optional configuration)

parameters.name: giftCardID
parameters.description: Gift card identification.

balance.description: Giftcard current balance. For newly created giftcards, the balance will be 0.0.

post.description: Creates a gift card for a specific user in a gift card provider.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Media type(s) that is/are acceptable for the response. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The Media type of the body of the request. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json

parameters.name: X-PROVIDER-API-AppKey
parameters.description: The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional configuration)

parameters.name: X-PROVIDER-API-AppToken
parameters.description: The AppToken configured by the merchant (optional configuration)

relationName.description: Represents the relationship between the client and the store.

emissionDate.description: It must be in the format `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.fff` (ISO 8601 format).

expiringDate.description: It must be in the format `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.fff` (ISO 8601 format).

caption.description: Field to be filled in if a loyalty program must be created for the Giftcard.

restrictedToOwner.description: The Giftcard can only be used for a specified client's ID.

multipleRedemptions.description: The Giftcard can be used to make new purchases until its value is completely used.

multipleCredits.description: The Giftcard balance can be changed.

post.description: Creates a transaction (credit or debit) for a gift card in a gift card provider and authorizes the item reservation.

post.description:
This request can be used to:

1. Cancel a transaction for a specific gift card in a gift card provider.

2. Cancel an item's reservation or create a refund.
